law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"License" means a license issued by the clerk to do business as a trading stamp issuer.
"Trading stamp" means a certificate, coupon, label, stamp, ticket, or other similar device that is redeemable for goods.

section.section: "Trading stamp issuer" means a person who sells or delivers trading stamps to another person in connection with a sale of goods by the other person.
"Trading stamp issuer" includes a manufacturer or packer that issues trading stamps in connection with the sale of its products.
